application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Royal Hospital, Royal Hospital Road, LONDON, SW3 4SR
description: Details required by Condition 27(a) (Contamination - Site Investigation Scheme - refurbishment of Soane Stable Block) of planning permission PP/22/03514 (Variation of condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) 27 (Contamination - Site Investigation Scheme) 28 (Contamination - Site investigation and quantitative risk assessment) 29 (Contamination - Remediation method statement) of planning permission 21/02304 to condition 2 to reflect the new plans in order to implement the proposed changes, 27, 28 and 29 to allow for phased discharge of the conditions)
